subject: Re: [junit] First time install
msgSnippet: I would suggest that you try using the latest version of JUnit (3.8.1), available from http://www.junit.org. ... Hi, I am a first time new user of JUnit. I am
messageBody:
I would suggest that you try using the latest version of JUnit (3.8.1), available from http://www.junit.org

>>> manochanikunj@... 10/06/2003 2:26:17 am >>>
Hi,

I am a first time new user of JUnit. I am trying to install it on
my PC. After downloading and seeting environment variables i tried
testing the textualtunner as described in the readme file. I have the
following error.. The readme file suggests there should be no errors
for a proper install.


C:\TEMP\testrun\junit3.2>java junit.textui.TestRunner
junit.samples.AllTests
...............................................................F
Time: 0.093

FAILURES!!!
Test Results:
Run: 63 Failures: 1 Errors: 0
There was 1 failure:
1) testClassLoading(junit.tests.TestTestCaseClassLoader) "Exception
during class
loading"



What could be worng? I am using j2sdk1.4.*... is that the problem??
Please suggest.

Reagrds,
Nikunj
